directions: [["Make the cucumber extract: Shred the cucumber into a bowl. Add vermouth and kosher salt, stir and allow it to rest for 10 minutes. Strain the cucumber through a fine filter or cheesecloth into a container, pressing to extract juice. "],["Add mint leaves and lime juice to shaker, muddle lightly."],["Add simple syrup, vodka, and cucumber extract. Stir and add ice, shake vigorously. "],["Strain into chilled martini glass. Garnish with a cucumber slice and/or mint leaf. "],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""]]
